title: Reorganize String
description:
Reorganize String

Leetcode 767. Reorganize String

You are given a string `s`, rearrange the characters of `s` so that any two **adjacent** characters are not the same.

You can return **any** possible rearrangement of `s` or return `""` if not posssible.

Examples:

  • Input: s = "axyy"

    Output: "xyay"
  • Input: s = "abbccdd"

    Output: "abcdbcd"
  • Input: s = "ccccd"

    Output: ""

Constraints:

  • `1 <= s.length <= 500`.
  • `s` is made up of lowercase English characters.

The approach analyzes input patterns and provides appropriate processing.

**Time Complexity:** O(n) or O(n log n) - depends on the algorithm used
**Space Complexity:** O(1) to O(n) - optimized for space when possible
